entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Maniwaki
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:38 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maniwaki Airport 1:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Temperature: -4.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 54 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -12.0°C
Wind: S 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of drizzle and ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
